attributes.action: Give booster vaccine to people on shielding list. They have low or no antibodies
attributes.additional_details:
They are still shielding, that's why they are not filling the hospitals yet! They cant shield forever, We need boosters asap.

I am aware we are all going to catch Covid at some point, but please get the vulnerable boosted so we can catch it as safely as possible.

+ boosters for over 50's or at least those in the same household as a vulnerable person.

Please give boosters to save lives and stop the NHS from collapse this autumn.
attributes.background:
Boosters are needed to protect people on the shielding list from hospitalisation or death.

These people are showing low or no antibodies, some levels have dropped off 4 months after vaccination in spring.

A lot of these people have paid out of their own pocket to get their antibodies tested.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition the Government has announced that the most vulnerable are to be offered COVID-19 booster vaccines from next week: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/most-vulnerable-to-be-offered-covid-19-booster-vaccines-from-next-week
